title: Relaxed Tasmania Escape 10 Minutes from Hobart with Onsite Family Bistro & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description: Stay with Nightcap at Carlyle Hotel to discover the best of Tasmania - from the Museum of Old and New Art to the gorgeous landscapes and abundance of wineries. Located in the charming suburb of Derwent Park, you're guaranteed a relaxing stay just outside the heart of Hobart. You've got the best of both worlds: explore the wineries peppered throughout the region, wander through nearby botanical gardens and hike the mighty Mount Wellington before returning for your favourite pub meal at the casual onsite family bistro.
offer_address: 232 Main Road, Derwent Park 7009, Tasmania, Australia
